resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

download.name: download
download.description: Whether to download the screenshot or return a link to it

output.name: output
output.description: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in
output.ai_hint: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in

options.name: options
options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

message.name: message
message.description: The text that should be turned into a QR code - like a website URL
message.ai_hint: The text that should be turned into a QR code - like a website URL

profileName.name: profileName
profileName.description: Profile name to get details of
profileName.ai_hint: Profile name to get details of

artistName.name: artistName
artistName.description: Artist name to get details for
artistName.ai_hint: Artist name to get details for

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'website' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'socialProfile' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'information' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'utility' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'pdf' AND resource == 'website' THEN SHOW parameter 'link'
IF operation == 'pdf' AND resource == 'website' THEN SHOW parameter 'download'
IF operation == 'pdf' AND resource == 'website' AND download == True THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF resource == 'website' AND operation == 'pdf' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'qrCode' AND resource == 'utility' THEN SHOW parameter 'message'
IF operation == 'qrCode' AND resource == 'utility' THEN SHOW parameter 'download'
IF operation == 'qrCode' AND resource == 'utility' AND download == True THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF resource == 'utility' AND operation == 'qrCode' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'screenshot' AND resource == 'website' THEN SHOW parameter 'link'
IF operation == 'screenshot' AND resource == 'website' THEN SHOW parameter 'download'
IF operation == 'screenshot' AND resource == 'website' AND download == True THEN SHOW parameter 'output'
IF resource == 'website' AND operation == 'screenshot' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'instagramProfile' AND resource == 'socialProfile' THEN SHOW parameter 'profileName'
IF operation == 'spotifyArtistProfile' AND resource == 'socialProfile' THEN SHOW parameter 'artistName'
IF operation == 'exchangeRate' AND resource == 'information' THEN SHOW parameter 'value'
IF operation == 'exchangeRate' AND resource == 'information' THEN SHOW parameter 'fromCurrency'
IF operation == 'exchangeRate' AND resource == 'information' THEN SHOW parameter 'toCurrency'
IF operation == 'imageMetadata' AND resource == 'information' THEN SHOW parameter 'link'
IF operation == 'seo' AND resource == 'website' THEN SHOW parameter 'link'
IF resource == 'website' AND operation == 'seo' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'validateEmail' AND resource == 'utility' THEN SHOW parameter 'emailAddress'
IF operation == 'expandURL' AND resource == 'utility' THEN SHOW parameter 'link'
